name.description: The name of the user. Null if the account is temporary.

uco.description: The uco of the user. Null if the account is temporary.

emailAddress.description: The email address of the user.

preferredCulture.description: The preferred culture of the user.

permissions.description: The explicit permissions this user has been granted.

AccountDetailDto.description: A detail of a user account.

ArgumentArity.description: The lower and upper bound for the count of something.

globalPermissions.description: Permissions that apply to all users, even the anonymous ones.

userPermissions.description: Permissions that apply to the currently logged in user. Includes the global permissions.

ProjectListDto.description: A DTO of a project. To be used when listing projects.
